sentences.en: "I think I'll try a hypnotist," I said with sudden resolution.
sentences.cn: “我会找催眠师试试，”我突然坚决地说。

sentences.en: A sudden break in the cloud allowed rescuers to spot Michael Benson.
sentences.cn: 天气的突然放晴帮助救援人员找到了迈克尔·本森。

sentences.en: a sudden change in the weather
sentences.cn: 天气的突然变化

sentences.en: a sudden movement
sentences.cn: 突然的一动

sentences.en: All of a sudden my heart hardened against her.
sentences.cn: 突然间我对她硬起了心肠。

sentences.en: Any unexpected circumstance that arises may catalyze a sudden escalation of violence.
sentences.cn: 任何突如其来的情况都可能造成暴力骤然升级。

sentences.en: He felt a sudden compulsion to drop the bucket and run.
sentences.cn: 他突然有一种想扔掉水桶撒腿就跑的冲动。

sentences.en: He felt a sudden rush of panic at the thought.
sentences.cn: 想到这点，他突然感到一阵强烈的恐慌。

sentences.en: He felt a sudden sense of calm, of contentment.
sentences.cn: 他突然感到一种安宁和满足.

sentences.en: He had been deeply affected by the sudden death of his father-in-law.
sentences.cn: 岳父的猝死使他十分伤心。

sentences.en: Her death was sudden.
sentences.cn: 她的死很突然。

sentences.en: I feel really tired all of a sudden.
sentences.cn: 我突然间感到真的很累。

sentences.en: Life is cruel, she thought, with a sudden rush of anger.
sentences.cn: 生活真残酷，她想，心头突然涌上一股怒气。

sentences.en: More and more frequently the vessel lurched into a sudden roll.
sentences.cn: 船不时会猛烈摇晃一下，而且越来越频繁。

sentences.en: Ryle explained the reason for his sudden return to London.
sentences.cn: 赖尔解释了他突然返回伦敦的原因。

sentences.en: The opening scene shows them celebrating their sudden deliverance from war.
sentences.cn: 开场的一幕是他们在庆祝自己突然从战争中解脱了出来。

sentences.en: The sudden height dizzied her and she clung tightly.
sentences.cn: 突然上升的高度让她晕头转向，她抓得紧紧的。

sentences.en: The sudden onset of winter caused havoc with rail and air transport.
sentences.cn: 冬天的突然降临让铁路和航空运输系统陷入混乱。

sentences.en: The whole ship shuddered and trembled at the sudden strain.
sentences.cn: 突然的拉力使得整只船剧烈颤动。

sentences.en: Wind caught the sudden puff of dust and blew it inland.
sentences.cn: 风猛地刮起一阵灰尘，将它吹往内陆。

(古)。 同 all of a sudden
心脏性猝死；突然心脏死
n. 猝死；突然死亡；[体]突然死亡法（决赛中的一分或一球定胜负法）

trans.tran_en: happening, coming, or done quickly or when you do not expect it
